text: George Burns (born Nathan Birnbaum, January 20, 1896â€“ March 9, 1996), was an American comedian, actor, and writer. He was well known for his comedy routines with his wife, Gracie Allen, involving her tall tales about her relatives. The Burns & Allen Show was broadcast on radio from 1942 to 1950 and on television from 1950 to 1958. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American centenarians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Writers from New York City
title: George Burns
